name: Lowpocalypse
description:
It all started with a glow up there, among the stars. 

Since then, nothing has been the same...

Lowpocalypse is a survival horror / stealth game set in a lowpoly world that is the scene of an apocalyptic alien invasion. 

The hostile alien race is capable of transforming humans into aggressive and bloodthirsty zombies by parasitizing them with its larvae.

Be silent and deadly by attacking enemies from behind and avoid running, light your flashlight and shoot if not necessary - crouching will make you less detectable.

Always keep an eye on the visibility indicator at the top right.

Make your way into the city and reach the hospital where your partner Geena is being held.

Developed as simple (and buggy) prototype for Themed Horror Game  Jam #6



===============================================================

Please consider playing the downloadable version whenever possible. The WebGL version is for demonstration purposes only and looks significantly worse

===============================================================
